flawed_nl_solution:
He cuts off 9-6=<<9-6=3>>3 inches when he gets a haircut
That means he needs to cut it every 3/1.5=<<3/1.5=2>>2 months
So he gets 12/2=<<12/2=6>>6 haircuts a year
He gives a 45*0.2=$<<45*0.2=9>>9 tip
So that means each hair cut cost 45+9=$<<45+9=45>>45
So he pays 45*6=$<<45*6=270>>270 a year
#### 270

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 45. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
